message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique and valuable product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $130?

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $140? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I get a good price for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $140 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'd be willing to go up to $135, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at $135?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $137.50? I think that's a fair price for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but $137.50 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you at $135, but I'm starting to think that if we can't meet at that price, I might have to explore other options. Can you really meet me at $135?

I understand you're getting close to exploring other options, Bob. I'm willing to make one more serious concession. I'll meet you at $137, but that's as low as I can go. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value.

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but $137 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you at $135, but if you can't meet me there, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options. I'm starting to think that $120 is a fair price for this product, and I might as well just buy it from John for that price if we can't agree.

I can see you're serious about exploring other options, Bob. I'm willing to make one final concession. I'll meet you at $136, but that's as low as I can go. I'm not comfortable going any lower than that.

I appreciate your willingness to make one final concession, but $136 is still not acceptable to me. I'm willing to meet you at $135, but if you're not willing to meet me there, I'm afraid I'll have to go with the original plan and buy the product from John for $120. I'm not willing to pay more than that.
